info.title: TheFaithApp API
info.description: The Faith App API for managing church subscriptions and retrieving audio and video sermons.

post.description: Subscribes a user to a church using their Firebase ID token and the client API key.

parameters.name: X-API-Key
parameters.description: Your client API key from the dashboard (Settings page).

requestBody.description: FCM token for the user's device.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid API key or Firebase token.

404.description: Client or Firebase credentials not found.

example: The fcm token field is required.

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of audio sermons for the authenticated user's church. Supports optional search and pagination.

parameters.name: X-API-Key
parameters.description: Your client API key from the dashboard (Settings page).

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search term to filter audio sermons.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination (default: 1).

current_page.description: Current page number of the result set.

id.description: Unique identifier for the audio sermon.

client_id.description: ID of the church/client this audio belongs to.

category_id.description: ID of the category for this audio.

source.description: URL to the audio file or external audio link.

duration.description: Duration of the audio in MM:SS format.

media_type.description: Type of audio source. `0` = uploaded audio file, `1` = provided audio link.

deleted_at.description: Timestamp when the audio was deleted, or null if not deleted.

created_at.description: Timestamp when the audio was created.

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the audio was last updated.

cover_photo.description: URL to the cover photo image for the audio.

first_page_url.description: URL to the first page of results.

from.description: Index of the first item returned.

last_page.description: Last page number of the result set.

last_page_url.description: URL to the last page of results.

url.description: URL for the page link, or null if not available.

label.description: Label for the page link (e.g., 'Next', 'Previous', or page number).

active.description: Whether this page link is active.

next_page_url.description: URL to the next page of results, or null if on the last page.

path.description: Base path for the paginated results.

prev_page_url.description: URL to the previous page of results, or null if on the first page.

to.description: Index of the last item returned.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid API key or Firebase token.

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of video sermons for the authenticated user's church. Supports optional search and pagination.

parameters.name: X-API-Key
parameters.description: Your client API key from the dashboard (Settings page).

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search term to filter video sermons.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination (default: 1).

current_page.description: Current page number of the result set.

id.description: Unique identifier for the video sermon.

client_id.description: ID of the church/client this video belongs to.

category_id.description: ID of the category for this video.

title.example: A Man Works For His Wife's Father While She Spends Time With Other Guys

description.example: Today we're reviewing the comedy-drama film from 2007...

source.description: Video source identifier. For YouTube videos, this is the YouTube video ID. For uploaded videos, this may be a file name or path.

duration.description: Duration of the video in MM:SS format.

media_type.description:
Type of video source. Possible values:
- `2`: Upload MP4 Video
- `3`: MP4 Video Link
- `4`: YouTube Video ID
- `5`: Vimeo Video ID
- `6`: Dailymotion Video ID
- `7`: MPD Video Link
- `8`: M3U8 Video Link

deleted_at.description: Timestamp when the video was deleted, or null if not deleted.

created_at.description: Timestamp when the video was created.

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the video was last updated.

cover_photo.description: URL to the cover photo image for the video.

first_page_url.description: URL to the first page of results.

from.description: Index of the first item returned.

last_page.description: Last page number of the result set.

last_page_url.description: URL to the last page of results.

url.description: URL for the page link, or null if not available.

label.description: Label for the page link (e.g., 'Next', 'Previous', or page number).

active.description: Whether this page link is active.

next_page_url.description: URL to the next page of results, or null if on the last page.

path.description: Base path for the paginated results.

prev_page_url.description: URL to the previous page of results, or null if on the first page.

to.description: Index of the last item returned.

data.title: A Man Works For His Wife's Father While She Spends Time With Other Guys
data.description:
Today we're reviewing the comedy-drama film from 2007. Get ready for incredible plot twists!
A man marries a rich woman and works for her father. At the same time, his wife has a habit of inviting strangers to visit to get to know them better, which her husband does not know about.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid API key or Firebase token.

get.description: Retrieve the current live video and audio streaming information for the authenticated user's church.

parameters.name: X-API-Key
parameters.description: Your client API key from the dashboard (Settings page).

200.description: Current live video and audio streaming information.

video_streaming.description: Information about the current live video stream.

id.description: Unique identifier for the video stream.

live_title.description: Title of the live video stream.

source.description:
Type of video streaming source. Possible values:
- `0`: RTMP Live
- `1`: YouTube Live ID
- `2`: M3U8 URL

live_stream_url.description: URL to the live video stream (e.g., YouTube embed link).

live_status.description: Live status of the video stream. `0` = live, `1` = not live.

client_id.description: ID of the church/client this stream belongs to.

deleted_at.description: Timestamp when the stream was deleted, or null if not deleted.

created_at.description: Timestamp when the stream was created.

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the stream was last updated.

audio_streaming.description: Information about the current live audio stream.

id.description: Unique identifier for the audio stream.

stream_url.description: URL to the live audio stream.

type.description: Type identifier for the audio stream.

status.description: Live status of the audio stream. `0` = live, `1` = not live.

thumbnail.description: URL to the thumbnail image for the audio stream.

client_id.description: ID of the church/client this stream belongs to.

deleted_at.description: Timestamp when the stream was deleted, or null if not deleted.

created_at.description: Timestamp when the stream was created.

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the stream was last updated.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid API key or Firebase token.

get.description: Retrieve devotionals for the authenticated user's church. When X-Client-Date header is provided, returns a single devotional for that date with metadata. Otherwise, returns a paginated list of devotionals.

parameters.name: X-API-Key
parameters.description: Your client API key from the dashboard (Settings page).

parameters.name: X-Client-Date
parameters.description: The date for which to retrieve the devotional (format: YYYY-MM-DD). If provided, returns a single devotional for that date with metadata. If not provided, returns a paginated list of devotionals.

parameters.name: X-Client-Timezone
parameters.description: The timezone to use for date calculations (e.g., 'America/New_York'). Only used when X-Client-Date is provided. If not provided, uses UTC.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search term to filter devotionals. Only used when X-Client-Date is not provided.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination (default: 1). Only used when X-Client-Date is not provided.

200.description: Devotional information. Returns either a single devotional with metadata when X-Client-Date is provided, or a paginated list of devotionals when no date is specified.

single_devotional.summary: Response when X-Client-Date header is provided

devotional.title: We're Not Mere Humans
devotional.author: Chris Parker
devotional.bible_reading: These things have I written unto you...

paginated_list.summary: Response when no X-Client-Date header is provided

data.title: We're Not Mere Humans
data.author: Chris Parker
data.bible_reading: These things have I written unto you...

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid API key or Firebase token.

422.description: Validation error - Invalid date format or timezone.

get.description: Retrieve the profile information for the authenticated user's church, including socials and branches.

parameters.name: X-API-Key
parameters.description: Your client API key from the dashboard (Settings page).

location.description: Physical address or location of the church.

image.description: URL to the church's image or logo.

created_at.description: Timestamp when the church was created.

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the church was last updated.

about.description: About or description of the church (may contain HTML).
about.example:
Kingdom Life Church is a Christ-centered community passionate about worship, discipleship, and outreach. Located in the heart of the city, we welcome people from all walks of life to experience the love and grace of God. Our mission is to raise up faithful believers who impact their families, workplaces, and communities for Christ.

One of our core ministries is the Compassion Ministry, which focuses on serving the practical needs of those around us. From monthly food drives and clothing donations to visiting the sick and supporting single-parent homes, this ministry is rooted in the belief that small acts of kindness can lead to life-changing encounters with God. Volunteers in this ministry are the hands and feet of Jesus, spreading hope and love throughout the city.

Whether you're looking for a place to grow spiritually or a way to make a difference, the Compassion Ministry offers a meaningful way to serve. We invite anyone with a heart to help others to join us as we continue to be a light in our community, one act of compassion at a time.

giving_link.description: URL for online giving/donations for the church.

prayer_request_link.description: URL for submitting prayer requests to the church.

socials.description: Social media links for the church.

id.description: Unique identifier for the socials object.

deleted_at.description: Timestamp when the socials were deleted, or null if not deleted.

created_at.description: Timestamp when the socials were created.

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the socials were last updated.

branches.description: List of branch objects for the church.

contact.description: Contact phone number for the branch.

created_at.description: Timestamp when the branch was created.

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the branch was last updated.

deleted_at.description: Timestamp when the branch was deleted, or null if not deleted.

gatherings.description: List of gatherings/meetings for the church.

client_id.description: ID of the church/client this gathering belongs to.

gathering_type_id.description:
ID of the gathering type. Possible values:
- `1`: Service - Regular worship services including Sunday services, midweek services, etc.
- `2`: Study - Bible study groups, Sunday school, discipleship classes
- `3`: Prayer - Regular prayer gatherings, prayer vigils
- `4`: Youth - Youth services, youth meetings, youth activities
- `5`: Children - Children's church, Sunday school, children's activities
- `6`: Food Pantry - Food distribution services, community feeding programs
- `7`: Outreach - Community outreach, evangelism programs
- `8`: Fellowship - Fellowship meals, social gatherings, community events
- `9`: Choir - Choir rehearsals, music ministry practices
- `10`: Counseling - Pastoral counseling, support groups

day_of_week.description: Day of the week when the gathering occurs.

is_active.description: Whether the gathering is currently active.

created_at.description: Timestamp when the gathering was created.

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the gathering was last updated.

deleted_at.description: Timestamp when the gathering was deleted, or null if not deleted.

church.name: Monk House Maker
church.about:
Kingdom Life Church is a Christ-centered community passionate about worship, discipleship, and outreach. Located in the heart of the city, we welcome people from all walks of life to experience the love and grace of God. Our mission is to raise up faithful believers who impact their families, workplaces, and communities for Christ.

One of our core ministries is the Compassion Ministry, which focuses on serving the practical needs of those around us. From monthly food drives and clothing donations to visiting the sick and supporting single-parent homes, this ministry is rooted in the belief that small acts of kindness can lead to life-changing encounters with God. Volunteers in this ministry are the hands and feet of Jesus, spreading hope and love throughout the city.

Whether you're looking for a place to grow spiritually or a way to make a difference, the Compassion Ministry offers a meaningful way to serve. We invite anyone with a heart to help others to join us as we continue to be a light in our community, one act of compassion at a time.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid API key or Firebase token.

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of events for the authenticated user's church. Supports optional pagination.

parameters.name: X-API-Key
parameters.description: Your client API key from the dashboard (Settings page).

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination (default: 1).

current_page.description: Current page number of the result set.

deleted_at.description: Timestamp when the event was deleted, or null if not deleted.

client_id.description: ID of the church/client this event belongs to.

thumbnail.description: URL to the event's thumbnail image.

details.description: Details or description of the event (may contain HTML).

date.description: Date and time of the event.

created_at.description: Timestamp when the event was created.

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the event was last updated.

first_page_url.description: URL to the first page of results.

from.description: Index of the first item returned.

last_page.description: Last page number of the result set.

last_page_url.description: URL to the last page of results.

url.description: URL for the page link, or null if not available.

label.description: Label for the page link (e.g., 'Next', 'Previous', or page number).

active.description: Whether this page link is active.

next_page_url.description: URL to the next page of results, or null if on the last page.

path.description: Base path for the paginated results.

prev_page_url.description: URL to the previous page of results, or null if on the first page.

to.description: Index of the last item returned.

put.description: Update the profile details of the authenticated member. This endpoint allows updating personal information such as phone number, gender, and biography.

parameters.name: X-API-Key
parameters.description: Your client API key from the dashboard (Settings page).

phone.description: Member's phone number in international format (e.g., +1234567890).

message.description: Success message indicating the update was successful.

member.description: Updated member object containing all member details.

client_id.description: ID of the church/client this member belongs to.

login_type.description: Authentication method used by the member (e.g., 'firebase').

deleted_at.description: Timestamp when the member was deleted, or null if not deleted.

created_at.description: Timestamp when the member was created.

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the member was last updated.

uuid.description: Unique identifier from the authentication provider (e.g., Firebase UID).

phone.description: Member's phone number in international format.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid API key or Firebase token.

post.description: Information about a new plant added to the store

200.description: Return a 200 status to indicate that the data was received successfully

metadata.description: Additional information about the devotional and its context

is_recurring.description: Indicates whether this devotional is set to recur annually on the same date

next_available_date.description: For recurring devotionals, shows the next date when this devotional will be available (one year from the current date). Null for non-recurring devotionals.

has_past_devotionals.description: Indicates whether there are any devotionals available for dates before the requested date

navigation.description: Navigation links for moving between dates

previous_date.description: The date immediately before the requested date, formatted as YYYY-MM-DD

next_date.description: The date immediately after the requested date, formatted as YYYY-MM-DD

current_page.description: Current page number of the result set.

first_page_url.description: URL to the first page of results.

from.description: Index of the first item returned.

last_page.description: Last page number of the result set.

last_page_url.description: URL to the last page of results.

url.description: URL for the page link, or null if not available.

label.description: Label for the page link (e.g., 'Next', 'Previous', or page number).

active.description: Whether this page link is active.

next_page_url.description: URL to the next page of results, or null if on the last page.

path.description: Base path for the paginated results.

prev_page_url.description: URL to the previous page of results, or null if on the first page.

to.description: Index of the last item returned.
